overview: This long-term observational film compares the situation of prisoners sentenced for life with the situation of those who leave their prison cells after several years. What does a man who has been looking forward to the day he would leave the prison gate for such a long time do? How does he cope with the fact that everything is different from what he imagined? What choices will he make?
tagline: The film follows different prisoners and ex-prisoners as they try to live their lives the best way they can, inside and outside the prison.
title: Venku
